mapper.select: SELECT MP.PARTNER_CD , MP.PARTNER_CD AS KEY_ID , MP.PARTNER_NM , MP.DO_INVOICE_YN FROM MOM_PARTNER MP WHERE MP.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MP.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MP.PARTNER_CD

SELECT MUI.USER_NO , MU.USER_NM , MU.DEPT_CD , MU.POSITION FROM MOM_USER_ITEM_TYPE_REL MUI , MOM_USER MU WHERE MUI.COMPANY_CD = MU.COMPANY_CD AND MUI.DIVISION_CD = MU.DIVISION_CD AND MUI.USER_NO = MU.USER_NO AND MUI.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUI.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUI.CATEGORY = #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUI.ITEM_TYPE = NVL(#{itemType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MUI.ITEM_TYPE) AND MUI.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MU.USER_NM
